mapper.insert: insert INTO `gmair_airquality`.`station_aqi_full` (station_id, aqi_index, aqi_level, pri_pollut, pm_2_5, pm_10, co, no_2, no_3, so_2, record_time, block_flag, create_time) VALUES ( #{stationId}, #{aqi}, #{aqiLevel}, #{primePollution}, #{pm2_5}, #{pm10}, #{co}, #{no2}, #{o3}, #{so2}, #{recordTime}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt} )

insert INTO `gmair_airquality`.`station_aqi_full` (station_id, aqi_index, aqi_level, pri_pollut, pm_2_5, pm_10, co, no_2, no_3, so_2, record_time, block_flag, create_time) VALUES
( #{airQuality.stationId}, #{airQuality.aqi}, #{airQuality.aqiLevel}, #{airQuality.primePollution}, #{airQuality.pm2_5}, #{airQuality.pm10}, #{airQuality.co}, #{airQuality.no2}, #{airQuality.o3}, #{airQuality.so2}, #{airQuality.recordTime}, #{airQuality.blockFlag}, #{airQuality.createAt} )
